fields.title: Sherlock Holmes
fields.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
fields.description: A collection of short stories where a brilliant yet detached detective solves mysteries with his sidekick doctor.

fields.title: Nancy Drew
fields.author: Carolyn Keene
fields.description: Nancy Drew takes on several local mysteries with her two best friends

fields.title: Cards on the Table
fields.author: Carolyn Keene
fields.description: Detective Hercules Poirot unravels a mysterious murder between 4 suspects in a Bridge game

fields.title: Don Quixote
fields.author: Sylvia Plath
fields.description: Follow Don Quixote and his sidekick as they run into dillusional shenanigans

fields.title: The Iliad
fields.author: Homer
fields.description: Epic poem that recounts the final weeks of the Trojan War

fields.title: Harry Potter
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.description: Magical orphan boy tries to save the world at a wizard school

fields.title: Good Omens
fields.author: Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman
fields.description: An angel and demon team up to prevent the end of times
